channel.title: 317 Removing Welcome Screen?
channel.description:
Hi, Recently i have been creating a 317 private server with my mate and we have come across one problem that is making the server lagg.. the welcome screen... it was already added when we got the source. I was wondering if any of you could kindly help us. I have been trying to get rid of it but this is what has happened.. http://www.mediafire.com/i/?moxzz4ifohm3z3n < Image
this is my class 9 file atm..
http://www.mediafire.com/?4nimm2mdiycgzny < please look :)
i hope your willing to help fix this problem Thanks Tim

item.title: 317 Removing Welcome Screen?
item.dc:creator: @magic_note magic note
item.description:
@magic_note wrote:

thanks for your fast response but it didnt find it inside client.java (i tried on source and client).

Thanks again

Figured out now, searched interface id in the servers client.java and deleted:P

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Removing Welcome Screen?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

client.java , initialize method. disable it from there.

Read full topic
